mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO S_Hometax_Z300X_Item ( CompCd, SvcCd, IssueNo, ItemNo, SupBizNo , ByrBizNo, ItemDt, ItemNm, ItemStd, ItemQty , ItemUnt, ItemSupAmt, ItemTaxAmt, ItemBigo, Rmk , ReqCd, IssueNoDisp, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.svcCd}, #{item.issueNo}, #{item.itemNo}, #{item.supBizNo} , #{item.byrBizNo}, #{item.itemDt}, #{item.itemNm}, #{item.itemStd}, #{item.itemQty} , #{item.itemUnt}, #{item.itemSupAmt}, #{item.itemTaxAmt}, #{item.itemBigo}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, #{item.issueNoDisp}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , SvcCd = VALUES(SvcCd) , IssueNo = VALUES(IssueNo) , ItemNo = VALUES(ItemNo)

INSERT INTO S_Hometax_Z4001 ( CompCd, TrDt, TrTm, ApprNo, IssueGb , SupAmt, TaxAmt, Tip, TotAmt, FrPartNo , TrGb, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trTm}, #{item.apprNo}, #{item.issueGb} , #{item.supAmt}, #{item.taxAmt}, #{item.tip}, #{item.totAmt}, #{item.frPartNo} , #{item.trGb}, #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , TrTm = VALUES(TrTm)

INSERT INTO S_Hometax_Z4010 ( CompCd, AprvDt, VatDdcClCd, CrcmClNm, BusnCrdCardNoEncCntn , MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn, MrntTxprNm, SplCft, VaTxamt, Tip , TotaTrsAmt, BmanClNm, BcNm, TfbNm, DdcYnNm , VatDdcClNm, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.aprvDt}, #{item.vatDdcClCd}, #{item.crcmClNm}, #{item.busnCrdCardNoEncCntn} , #{item.mrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn}, #{item.mrntTxprNm}, #{item.splCft}, #{item.vaTxamt}, #{item.tip} , #{item.totaTrsAmt}, #{item.bmanClNm}, #{item.bcNm}, #{item.tfbNm}, #{item.ddcYnNm} , #{item.vatDdcClNm}, #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , AprvDt = VALUES(AprvDt) , SplCft = VALUES(SplCft) , TotaTrsAmt = VALUES(TotaTrsAmt) , MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn = VALUES(MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn)

INSERT INTO S_Hometax_Z4020 ( CompCd, TrsDt, CrccTxprNm, WlfCardNoEncCntn, MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn , MrntTxprNm, SplCft, VaTxamt, Tip, TotaTrsAmt , BmanClNm, TfbNm, TrsClNm, DdcYnNm, VatDdcClNm , Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.trsDt}, #{item.crccTxprNm}, #{item.wlfCardNoEncCntn}, #{item.mrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn} , #{item.mrntTxprNm}, #{item.splCft}, #{item.vaTxamt}, #{item.tip}, #{item.totaTrsAmt} , #{item.bmanClNm}, #{item.tfbNm}, #{item.trsClNm}, #{item.ddcYnNm}, #{item.vatDdcClNm} , #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )

INSERT INTO S_Hometax_Z0006_Dtl ( CompCd, SupByr, TaxGb, WrtYr, WrtQt , WrtDt, Etan, WrtDtFrom, WrtDtTo, IsnDtm , TmsnDt, DmnrTxprDscmNo, DmnrMpbNoStr, TnmNm, RprsFnm , TotaAmt, SupSplCft, SumTxamt, EtxivKndCd, IsnTypeCd , EtxivSq1RmrkCntn, RecApeClCd, MchrgEmlAdrSls, MchrgEmlAdrPrh, Rmk , ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.supByr}, #{item.taxGb}, #{item.wrtYr}, #{item.wrtQt} , #{item.wrtDt}, #{item.etan}, #{item.wrtDtFrom}, #{item.wrtDtTo}, #{item.isnDtm} , #{item.tmsnDt}, #{item.dmnrTxprDscmNo}, #{item.dmnrMpbNoStr}, #{item.tnmNm}, #{item.rprsFnm} , #{item.totaAmt}, #{item.supSplCft}, #{item.sumTxamt}, #{item.etxivKndCd}, #{item.isnTypeCd} , #{item.etxivSq1RmrkCntn}, #{item.recApeClCd}, #{item.mchrgEmlAdrSls}, #{item.mchrgEmlAdrPrh}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , SupByr = VALUES(SupByr) , TaxGb = VALUES(TaxGb) , WrtYr = VALUES(WrtYr) , WrtQt = VALUES(WrtQt) , WrtDt = VALUES(WrtDt) , Etan = VALUES(Etan)

INSERT INTO S_Cardsales_B0011_Dtl ( CompCd, TrDt, TrTm, CardRealNo, ApprNo , TrDiv, CardCorp1, CardCorp2, MerNo, CardKndCd , CardKnd, CardNum, ApprAmt, InstDiv, InsTrm , Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trTm}, #{item.cardRealNo}, #{item.apprNo} , #{item.trDiv}, #{item.cardCorp1}, #{item.cardCorp2}, #{item.merNo}, #{item.cardKndCd} , #{item.cardKnd}, #{item.cardNum}, #{item.apprAmt}, #{item.instDiv}, #{item.insTrm} , #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , TrTm = VALUES(TrTm) , ApprNo = VALUES(ApprNo)

( #{item.compCd}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trSumAmt}, #{item.trSumCnt}, #{item.apprSumAmt} , #{item.apprSumCnt}, #{item.canSumAmt}, #{item.canSumCnt}, #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd} , 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt)

INSERT INTO S_Cardsales_B0021_Dtl ( CompCd, TrDt, BuyDt, ApprNo, CardCorp1 , CardCorp2, MerNo, CardKnd, CardNum, CardDivCd , CardDiv, BuyAmt, CommMem, CommPoint, CommEtc , CommSum, CommVat, PayAmt, PayDt, Rmk , ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.buyDt}, #{item.apprNo}, #{item.cardCorp1} , #{item.cardCorp2}, #{item.merNo}, #{item.cardKnd}, #{item.cardNum}, #{item.cardDivCd} , #{item.cardDiv}, #{item.buyAmt}, #{item.commMem}, #{item.commPoint}, #{item.commEtc} , #{item.commSum}, #{item.commVat}, #{item.payAmt}, #{item.payDt}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , BuyDt = VALUES(BuyDt) , ApprNo = VALUES(ApprNo) , PayAmt = VALUES(PayAmt)

( #{item.compCd}, #{item.buyDt}, #{item.buySumAmt}, #{item.buySumCnt}, #{item.paySumAmt} , #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, #{item.commMem}, #{item.commPoint}, #{item.commEtc} , #{item.commSum}, #{item.commVat}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , BuyDt = VALUES(BuyDt)

INSERT INTO S_Cardsales_B0031_Dtl ( CompCd, PayDt, MemNo, AcctNo, CardCorp1 , Bank, SalesCnt, SalesAmt, DetAmt, CommVat , EtcAmt, RealPayAmt, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.payDt}, #{item.memNo}, #{item.acctNo}, #{item.cardCorp1} , #{item.bank}, #{item.salesCnt}, #{item.salesAmt}, #{item.detAmt}, #{item.commVat} , #{item.etcAmt}, #{item.realPayAmt}, #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin' , now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , PayDt = VALUES(PayDt) , AcctNo = VALUES(AcctNo)

INSERT INTO S_Cardsales_B0031_Sum ( CompCd, PayDt, SalesSumAmt, SalesSumCnt, PaySumAmt , Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.payDt}, #{item.salesSumAmt}, #{item.salesSumCnt}, #{item.paySumAmt} , #{item.rmk}, #{item.reqCd}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , PayDt = VALUES(PayDt)

INSERT INTO S_Bank_B0002 ( CompCd, AcctNo, TrDt, TrTm, Balance , BankCd, InAmt, OutAmt, TrBr, TrNm , TrTp, TrDetail, RecvAcctNo, Memo, Rmk , ReqCd, TrRnd, Wlbn, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.acctNo}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trTm}, #{item.balance} , #{item.bankCd}, #{item.inAmt}, #{item.outAmt}, #{item.trBr}, #{item.trNm} , #{item.trTp}, #{item.trDetail}, #{item.recvAcctNo}, #{item.memo}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, #{item.trRnd}, #{item.wlbn}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , AcctNo = VALUES(AcctNo) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , TrTm = VALUES(TrTm)

( #{item.compCd}, #{item.acctNo}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trTm}, #{item.balance} , #{item.bankCd}, #{item.inAmt}, #{item.outAmt}, #{item.curCd}, #{item.trBr} , #{item.trNm}, #{item.trTp}, #{item.trDetail}, #{item.recvAcctNo}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, #{item.trRnd}, #{item.wlbn}, #{item.memo}, 'admin' , now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , AcctNo = VALUES(AcctNo) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , TrTm = VALUES(TrTm)

INSERT INTO S_Sbk_B0002 ( CompCd, AcctNo, TrDt, TrTm, Balance , BankCd, InAmt, OutAmt, TrBr, TrNm , TrTp, TrDetail, RecvAcctNo, Memo, Rmk , ReqCd, TrRnd, Wlbn, RegId, RegDt ) VALUES
( #{item.compCd}, #{item.acctNo}, #{item.trDt}, #{item.trTm}, #{item.balance} , #{item.bankCd}, #{item.inAmt}, #{item.outAmt}, #{item.trBr}, #{item.trNm} , #{item.trTp}, #{item.trDetail}, #{item.recvAcctNo}, #{item.memo}, #{item.rmk} , #{item.reqCd}, #{item.trRnd}, #{item.wlbn}, 'admin', now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CompCd = VALUES(CompCd) , AcctNo = VALUES(AcctNo) , TrDt = VALUES(TrDt) , TrTm = VALUES(TrTm)
mapper.select: SELECT CompCd, AppCd, OrgCd, SvcCd, KeyCd , ScrapDt, MAX(ReqCd) AS ReqCd, ScrapFromDt, ScrapToDt , ReqDt, InJson FROM History_Req WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ScrapDt = #{scrapDt} GROUP BY CompCd, AppCd, OrgCd, SvcCd, KeyCd, ScrapDt

SELECT CompCd, ScrapDt, AppCd, OrgCd, SvcCd , KeyCd, MAX(ReqCd) AS ReqCd, ResCd, ResMsg, ConnCnt , ErrYn, ErrMsg, OutTime, BridgeAppVer, BridgeHostNm , BridgeOsNm, BridgeReqDt, BridgeResDt, Worker, WorkerAppVer , WorkerHostNm, WorkerOsNm, WorkerReqDt, WorkerResDt FROM History_Res hr WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ScrapDt = #{scrapDt} GROUP BY CompCd, ScrapDt, AppCd, OrgCd, SvcCd, KeyCd, hr.ReqCd

SELECT CompCd, SvcCd, SupByr, MakeDt, IssueNo , IssueNoDisp, IssueDt, SendDt, SupBizNo, SupBizSubNo , SupCorpNm, SupRepNm, SupAddress, ByrBizNo, ByrBizSubNo , ByrCorpNm, ByrRepNm, ByrAddress, TotAmt, SupAmt , TaxAmt, TaxClsf, TaxKnd, IsnType, Bigo , DemandGb, SupEmail, ByrEmail1, ByrEmail2, ItemDt , ItemNm, ItemStd, ItemQty, ItemUnt, ItemSupAmt , ItemTaxAmt, ItemBigo, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z300X WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, SvcCd, IssueNo, ItemNo, SupBizNo , ByrBizNo, ItemDt, ItemNm, ItemStd, ItemQty , ItemUnt, ItemSupAmt, ItemTaxAmt, ItemBigo, Rmk , ReqCd, IssueNoDisp, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z300X_Item WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
SELECT CompCd, TrDt, TrTm, ApprNo, IssueGb , SupAmt, TaxAmt, Tip, TotAmt, FrPartNo , TrGb, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4001 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, TrDt, TrTm, ApprNo, UseStore , StoreNo, SupAmt, TaxAmt, Tip, TotAmt , FrPartNo, TrGb, DdcYn, BmanClNm, TfbCd , TfbNm, Bigo, Rmk, ReqCd, IssueGb , RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, AprvDt, VatDdcClCd, CrcmClNm, BusnCrdCardNoEncCntn , MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn, MrntTxprNm, SplCft, VaTxamt, Tip , TotaTrsAmt, BmanClNm, BcNm, TfbNm, DdcYnNm , VatDdcClNm, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4010 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, TrsDt, CrccTxprNm, WlfCardNoEncCntn, MrntTxprDscmNoEncCntn , MrntTxprNm, SplCft, VaTxamt, Tip, TotaTrsAmt , BmanClNm, TfbNm, TrsClNm, DdcYnNm, VatDdcClNm , Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4020 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
SELECT CompCd, StlYm, StlScnt, TotaStlAmt, EtcSls , PurcEuCardSls, Tip, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4050 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
SELECT CompCd, SttsYm, CshSlsSplCftAmt, CshSlsVatAmt, CshSlsTipAmt , CshSlsAmt, CshSlsScnt, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4060 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
SELECT CompCd, ExprRtnNo, ShpnDt, IsoCrncCd, Exgrt , Fmt, Wtt, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z4070 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, ItrfCd, TxnrmYm, RtnClCd, RtnDt , MtfbCd, FrsRgtDtm, RtnClNm, Tin, RtnCvaId , RtnClDetailCd, RtnClDetailNm, PymnYm, SbmsYm, StmnKndCd , StmnKndNm, TxnrmStrtDt, TxnrmEndDt, TxprNm, TxprNo , RcatNo, RcatDt, CvaAplnDtm, ChrgTxhfOgzCd, UserId , StasAmt, OgntxSbtrScpmTxamt, OgntxInpmSchuTxamt, OgntxSbtrPmtTxamt, FnftxSbtrScpmTxamt , FnftxInpmSchuTxamt, FnftxSbtrPmtTxamt, AprpAfthPmtTxamt, SurcRtnClCd, TmonCrfwRfndTxamt , RtnRfndClCd, RfndAplnAmt, VatRtnYr, Txtpe, VatActlPmtTxamt , VlntSbtrPmtTxamt, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z5002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, SupByr, TaxGb, WrtYr, WrtQt , WrtDtFrom, WrtDtTo, WithIn_bsnoIsnClplcCnt, WithIn_bsnoIsnScnt, WithIn_bsnoIsnSplCft , WithIn_bsnoIsnTxamt, WithIn_resnoIsnClplcCnt, WithIn_resnoIsnScnt, WithIn_resnoIsnSplCft , WithIn_resnoIsnTxamt , WithIn_totCnt, WithIn_totPurchplcCnt, WithIn_totSellplcCnt, WithIn_totSplCft, WithIn_totTxamt , Et_bsnoIsnClplcCnt, Et_bsnoIsnScnt, Et_bsnoIsnSplCft, Et_bsnoIsnTxamt, Et_resnoIsnClplcCnt , Et_resnoIsnScnt, Et_resnoIsnSplCft, Et_resnoIsnTxamt, Et_totCnt, Et_totPurchplcCnt , Et_totSellplcCnt, Et_totSplCft, Et_totTxamt, Rmk, ReqCd , RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z0006 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, SupByr, TaxGb, WrtYr, WrtQt , WrtDt, Etan, WrtDtFrom, WrtDtTo, IsnDtm , TmsnDt, DmnrTxprDscmNo, DmnrMpbNoStr, TnmNm, RprsFnm , TotaAmt, SupSplCft, SumTxamt, EtxivKndCd, IsnTypeCd , EtxivSq1RmrkCntn, RecApeClCd, MchrgEmlAdrSls, MchrgEmlAdrPrh, Rmk , ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Hometax_Z0006_Dtl WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, MerNo, CardNm, StlBankNm, StlAcctNo , SinYongFeeRate, CheckFeeRateB, CheckFeeRateC, PymPeriod, Rmk , ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, TrDt, TrTm, CardRealNo, ApprNo , TrDiv, CardCorp1, CardCorp2, MerNo, CardKndCd , CardKnd, CardNum, ApprAmt, InstDiv, InsTrm , Rmk, ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0011_Dtl WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
SELECT CompCd, TrDt, TrSumAmt, TrSumCnt, ApprSumAmt , ApprSumCnt, CanSumAmt, CanSumCnt, Rmk, ReqCd , RegId, RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0011_Sum WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, TrDt, BuyDt, ApprNo, CardCorp1 , CardCorp2, MerNo, CardKnd, CardNum, CardDivCd , CardDiv, BuyAmt, CommMem, CommPoint, CommEtc , CommSum, CommVat, PayAmt, PayDt, Rmk , ReqCd, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0021_Dtl WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, BuyDt, BuySumAmt, BuySumCnt, PaySumAmt , Rmk, ReqCd, CommMem, CommPoint, CommEtc , CommSum, CommVat, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0021_Sum WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, PayDt, MemNo, AcctNo, CardCorp1 , Bank, SalesCnt, SalesAmt, DetAmt, CommVat , EtcAmt, RealPayAmt, Rmk, ReqCd, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Cardsales_B0031_Dtl WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, AcctNo, TrDt, TrTm, Balance , BankCd, InAmt, OutAmt, TrBr, TrNm , TrTp, TrDetail, RecvAcctNo, Memo, Rmk , ReqCd, TrRnd, Wlbn, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Bank_B0002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, AcctNo, TrDt, TrTm, Balance , BankCd, InAmt, OutAmt, CurCd, TrBr , TrNm, TrTp, TrDetail, RecvAcctNo, Rmk , ReqCd, TrRnd, Wlbn, Memo, RegId , RegDt FROM S_Cbk_B0002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, AcctNo, TrDt, TrTm, Balance , BankCd, InAmt, OutAmt, TrBr, TrNm , TrTp, TrDetail, RecvAcctNo, Memo, Rmk , ReqCd, TrRnd, Wlbn, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Sbk_B0002 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, UseDt, UseTm, ApprNo, UseCard , UseStore, UseAmt, UseDiv, ApprSt, PartialCancelAmt , InstMon, DiscAmt, SavePoint, SettleDt, StoreBizNo , StoreCeo, StoreAddr, StoreTel, StoreType, ExYn , ExCurCd, UseExAmt, AddTax, Tip, StoreBizNo2 , Rmk, ReqCd, GivenCardNo, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Card_C0005 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}

SELECT CompCd, UseDt, UseTm, ApprNo, UseCard , UseStore, UseAmt, UseExAmt, ExCurCd, UseDiv , ApprSt, InstMon, DiscAmt, SavePoint, SettleDt , StoreBizNo, StoreCeo, StoreAddr, StoreTel, StoreType , AddTax, Tip, TaxType, StoreSt, StoreNo , Rmk, ReqCd, GivenCardNo, RegId, RegDt FROM S_Ccd_C0005 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CompCd = #{compCd} AND ReqCd = #{reqCd}
